Don Santos' Famous Hunting Rifle is a great BM weapon.
It seems that Rawr.Hunter ignores the procc, although it's a great proportion of its "greatness".

I know it's hard to get an accurate number here, but posts on EJ suggest 125-150 bonus attack power which is huge.

I would really appreciate if you include the procc in the next version :)

The math for the hunting rifle is in there actually.  I got the formula from cheeky's spreadsheet.

    if (character.Ranged.Name == "Don Santos' Famous Hunting Rifle")
            {
                addtionalAPFromProcs += Math.Floor(250 * (1 - Math.Pow(.95, weightedTotalShotsPerSecond * 10)));
            }

Looking at that again on the spreadsheet, I am actually being generous, my formula does not take hits into account, its just shots / second, the spreadsheet is shots hit / second.

On my character that formula puts my +AP around 110.  If you can link the forum post discussing the +AP, I can see about adjusting the formula if need be.

Oh, it's in there?
Hmpf, then the weapon is far worse than I thought. I've read that it even comes close to the badge x-bow, but without adding additional attack power it's worse than Wolfsniper, Barrel-Blade and of course the badge bow. :/
